name: expo-kerberus
description: Kerberus is a PoW captcha. This Expo-Kerberus is a wrapper for expo application

scripts.updateIosFramework: cd Kerberus && ./gradlew :lib:assembleKerberusXCFramework && cd .. && rm -rf ./ios/Frameworks && mkdir -p ios/Frameworks && cp -r ./Kerberus/library/build/XCFrameworks/release/Kerberus.xcframework ios/Frameworks/Kerberus.xcframework
scripts.cleanReinstallPods: cd example/ios && rm -rf ~/Library/Caches/CocoaPods && rm -rf Pods && rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/ && pod deintegrate && pod setup && pod install && cd ../..

author: iCure <dev@icure.com> (https://github.com/icure)
